summary: Adds craft-able mages armor with immersive material and quest related requirements.
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION:[/b]
Are you a Mage working for the college, Warlock with his own plans or maybe you are a nercomancer searching the grave for materials to use in your experiments.
Then this is for you.

As 90% of mages armor is pre-enchanted and its hard to find something you look good in that has the enchants you want.

I, for one, have always been annoyed with that fact and that there was no craft-able mages clothing.

This mod aims to add all mages armor with realistic, immersive material and quest requirements.

(All recipes can be found under the Mage section in the Tanning Rack. (Temporary))
^Above is being worked on.
All clothes have had enchantment removed in favor for adding your own enchantments.
All recipes with vanilla materials and one custom item.
Required materials are as close to visually accurate as possible (STC)
Certain sets require specific quests to be completed in order to be able to craft them.
I will be adding more pics as i complete the quest myself.

[b]MAGE SETS:[/b]

[b]Skyrim[/b]
Greybeards
Novice Mage
Apprentice Mages
Adept Mages
Archmage
Psiijic Armor
Mythic Dawn
Necromancer set
Warlock Armor
Dark Brotherhood Set
Thalmor Set

[b]Dragonborn[/b]
Cultist Set (Temp - STC)
Telvani Set
Temple Priest Set

[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
CMA Requires Skyrim
CMA_Dragonborn Requires Skyrim, Update, Dragonborn and CMA.
CMA_Testing requires Skyrim, Update and CMA

[b]TO-DO:[/b]

- Add perk requirements for certain armors
- Add custom made mage armors

[b]LOOKING FOR:[/b]

- Modellers for custom mage sets
- Painters for custom or various sets of vanilla clothes
- Scriptwriter for custom overwrite/preference scripts

[b]NOTE - AS IS MOD:[/b]
This mod is in development and will change constantly. As such I take no responsibility for corrupted game-saves etc.

[b]RESOURCE PERMISSION:[/b]

Assorted Buckles - Dragten (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?)

[b]AWAITED PERMISSIONS:[/b]

Crafting Wheel - Nikinoodles (To give you an idea of where i'm going with this)

[b]USERS PERMISSIONS:[/b]

Any user may MODIFY, USE, PATCH or ADD to this mod as long as credit is given where due.
You may NOT convert or Upload on another site.

[b]CREDITS:[/b]
Dragten - Assorted Buckles from Bandoliers Mod.
Bethesda - For such awesome games and modding kits.
Gopher - Do i need to say more.

[b]UPDATES:[/b]

V1.0.4
Fixed (possibly) the category issue

V1.0.3
Changed CMA from .ESP to .ESM
Added 3 armor set from Dragonborn DLC with appropriate mats and quest requirements
-Cultist Set (Temp - STC)
-Telvani Set
-Temple Priest Set

V1.0.2
Added 2 more armor sets with appropriate mats and quest requirements
-Thalmor Armor
-Dark BrotherHood

V1.0.1
Added a file that adds 2 barrels ingame with materials required to make all armors.
Added 2 barrels for testing purposes.
- Riverwind blacksmith in the corner next to the forge.
- Whitehall blacksmith between the smelter and forge.

V1.0
Initial Release
author: MooseKelmavor
